title: Old map
body:
There should be an Option to use Old map as it brings alot of nostalgia to a person that played in the past and just came back to the game now
Plus the old map was really cool in its random stuff everywhere

I do also like the map currently nice clean look, just an option to use the old map would be nice :)

replies.body: They'd have to completely revamp it, it's not as simple as putting the old textures on because the new map is not just a retexture. All the geometry all the models all the terrain and pathing has all been completely redone. It's a possibility but would be far from a priority or something they could do as a quick fun thing. The old textures would just break if you tried to put them on the new map.

Yeah i know it wouldnt be a priority would just be cool if they had a feature to use the old map for like a week or two but still able to use the map currently

So like URF Old map would be interesting but i know it would be difficult
but would be pretty interesting
Ye it's defs be cool, just a lot of people underestimate just how much work would go into something like that. We can hope though :)
